participant_abstract.sent: A meeting was held at 14:20 on 4th February 2005 to discuss the conceptual design for the new TV remote control project.
The previous meeting was reviewed, with particular emphasis on our design goals: simplicity and fashion.
The industrial designer made a presentation describing the different materials and components we might be able to use.
The user interface designer suggested some simple design concepts around which a detailed design can be made.
The marketing manager discussed current trends in fashion that will influence our design decisions.
The meeting concluded with a lively discussion on the fashion and design of the product.

participant_decisions.sent: The remote control will have the following properties and functions: A few simple buttons for favouriate channels, volume and power on/off.
An on-screen menu interface provides access to more advanced features.
It will have a 'spongy' latex exterior, with a more solid interior to protect the components.

participant_problems.sent: It was difficult to decide between a scroll button or push buttons, as each has different advantages.
